results.title: The Corn is in danger = Kornet er fare
results.creator_credit: Hagen Hasselbalch and Nordisk Films Kompagni
results.brief_description: Opens with scenes of the harvesting of wheat. The life cycle of the corn weevil is shown and the damage that the weevil causes to stored wheat. An agricultural expert is shown examining an infested barn where the weevils are under flooboards and in all possible cracks and crevices; the building is sprayed to kill them. Ends with an appeal to all Danes to help destroy the pest. In Danish.

results.title: The Copter kids
results.creator_credit: Ronald Spencer, Children's Film Foundation and Pacesetter Productions
results.brief_description: A children’s comedy with a social message. A group of town kids form a vigilante group to stop an irresponsible cattle rustler and his two dim-witted sons from poaching cattle from Bramble Hollow to be sold to the European Communities.

results.title: The Cop and the anthem
results.creator_credit: Peter Mark Schifter, Terry Benes and Learning Corporation of America
results.brief_description: Soapy (played by Robert Morse), an affable vagrant in New York City at the turn of the century tries many ways to get himself put into jail for the winter. A classic tale of irony and pathos. Based on the short story by O. Henry.

results.title: The Cooling system and fuel system
results.creator_credit: United States. Office of Education. Division of Visual Aids
results.brief_description:
Episode number 4 of Series “Automobile Maintenance”.
Demonstrates how to check for leaks in the cooling system; check the fan and water pump; mechanical operation of the carburettor; filters and vents; and fuel pumps.

results.title: The Control of worms in sheep
results.creator_credit: Australian Wool Corporation and Ritter-Jepperson Studios
results.brief_description: Two neighbours, who own adjoining properties, both attempt to combat this disease in their sheep. The sheep in the first property are suffering from the combined effects of overstocking and worm parasites. On the second property, after a period of trial and error, what is termed correct stocking is achieved, and as a result, the worm problem solves itself. The film emphasises that sheep must be drenched at the right time and properly fed all the time.
results.description: Two neighbours, who own adjoining properties, both attempt to combat this disease in their sheep. The film emphasises that sheep must be drenched at the right time and properly fed all the time.
description_for_label: Two neighbours, who own adjoining properties, both attempt to combat this disease in their sheep. The sheep in the first property are suffering from the combined effects of overstocking and worm parasites. On the second property, after a period of trial and error, what is termed correct stocking is achieved, and as a result, the worm problem solves itself. The film emphasises that sheep must be drenched at the right time and properly fed all the time.

results.title: The Control of foot rot
results.brief_description: Detailed explanation of causes, symptoms and effective treatment of foot rot in sheep. Isolated cases must be penned separately and the flock checked to ensure that the disease has not spread. In flocks where foot rot is widespread, the only solution is the thorough inspection of all sheep, paring and cutting away all unhealthy tissue and painting with an antibiotic solution, or administering a formalin foot bath.

results.title: The Consumer game
results.creator_credit: Noel Nosseck, Directions Unlimited and Pyramid Films
results.brief_description: Reviews psychological and motivational techniques used to sell a product. Explains the concepts of comparison shopping, unit pricing, convenient packaging, financing, guarantees and labels. Hosted by Artie Johnston.

results.title: The Consultation
results.creator_credit: Liz Crosby, Frances McGivern and AFTRS
results.brief_description: Betty (Leverne McDonnell) sees Larry (Matthew Crosby) across a bar. There is mutual interest, engagement, excitement, and of course, attraction. A stylish, erotic drama with a twist in the tale; a romance for the times we live in.
